name: Billy vs Ghosts - Modern Ghost Zombie Shooting Games for adults and kids
name_original: Billy vs Ghosts - Modern Ghost Zombie Shooting Games for adults and kids
description:
Billy vs Zombie Ghost Shooting is a platform adventure shooting games.
So you're a Billy, the cool guy. He need to survive in this world of ghost zombies!
The goal is to collect as many coins as possible without getting killed by ghosts.

SHOOT ZOMBIES GHOSTS TO SURVIVE!
In this modern city game, jump to avoid zombie ghost if you want, but you will eventually need to kill them. You won't be able to escape easily because they are ton and ton of zombies!

COLLECT MONEY TO UPGRADE YOUR GUN!
Shoot and kill ghosts and collect more coins. Coins are the only accepted money to buy a new machine gun and shotgun. Shooting gore zombies ghosts as never been so fun!

KILL TO WIN!
Improve your skills, upgrade your gun. It was designed to be an addictive platform adventure game.

FEATURES OF Billy vs Zombie Ghost Shooting:
- 9 levels of pure ghost zombie killing!
- 3 guns to choose from : revolver, machine gun and shotgun
- HD graphics
- HD Quality Audio

Download and play Billy vs Zombie Ghost Shooting now !
